table.column: , 10524, After all functions are compiled and linked into a single design
, , After user unroll and inline pragmas are applied
(1) unroll, 715468 *, user unroll pragmas are applied
(2) simplification, 428638 *, simplification of applied user unroll pragmas
(3) inline, 428174 *, user inline pragmas are applied
(4) simplification, 378236 *, simplification of applied user inline pragmas
, , After user array partition and struct aggregate/disaggregate pragmas are applied
(1) array partition, 584731 *, user array partition pragmas are applied
(2) simplification, 379981 *, simplification of applied user array partition & struct aggregate/disaggregate pragmas
(3) aggregate/disaggregate , 379988 *, user struct aggregate/disaggregate pragmas are applied
(4) array reshape, 396719 *, apply array reshape pragmas
(5) access patterns, 394117 *, array access pattern optmizations
, , After transformations are applied to meet performance pragma targets
(1) loop simplification, 284281 *, loop and instruction simplification
(2) parallelization, 200870 *, loops are unrolled or pipelined to meet performance targets
(3) array partition, 200094 *, arrays are partitioned to meet performance targets
(4) simplification, 198690 *, simplification of design after performance transformations
, , After hardware transfomations
(1) lowering, 195036 *, initial conversion to HW specific instructions
(2) optimizations, 198009 *, high level synthesis optimizations

item.name: Instructions per Function for each Compilation Phase

note.desc: Exceeded design size warning message threshold

table.column: 100000, Show a warning when total design instructions exceeds this value
